void SplodgeRenderer::storeSplodge ( const Vector3 *  quad,
const Vector3 &  translation,
uint32  colour = 0x88888888 
)

This method saves up a splodge to draw at the appropriate time.

If translation points directly up then it is turned into a vector from the direction of the sun with the same magnitude, and the input quadrilateral is turned to face that direction, assuming it started out facing along the positive Z axis.
